page.title: 02Housing Estate, Montrose.
page.content: {Borrowfield}is a housing estate at the North end of{Montrose}and was begun in 1971.It is made up of{local authority, {S.S.H.A.,and private}houses.Most of the houses are 3apt.terraced with small front and back gardens.There are also private semi-detatched houses,detatched bungalows,and a small number of flats.A new private estate is being built at the moment. The bulk of the houses are{centrally heated}and well insulated.The{streets}are named after important local people or nearby places.eg.Provost Mitchell Road and Garvock Ave.For a modern housing estate,Borrowfield is a{well kept}and attractive area with most residents taking an obvious pride in their property and gardens.There is,however, a marked{lack of services and {amenities,}apart from play areas, school,community centre,shop and pub.
